title: (x) Where can I find Gotham? - Hoefler Type Foundry {Tiff}
content: I'm trying to find the font Gotham. All I know about it is that it's a Sans Serif, used by Pentagram Design, and is not the funky railroad font. Can anyone direct me to a website that carries it so I can view it?
author: poetica_design

comments.content: The board ate my response! Nice swift fingers, Tiff.

Now that my other browser window is open to it, I guess I should finally go ahead and get Gotham. Thanks a lot, Barbara -- you just cost me $200. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20111217033434im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
Damn, I love that typeface.
Oops, too late! That's ok -- I have to buy another font today already anyway.
Get the condensed version as well. It grows on you. When I first licensed it I thought I had gone overboard. But, now I am hoping they release more weights for it too!

Now that's weird, Chesh: I _did_ get your post by e-mail notification   
(you beat Tiff by mere seconds BTW), but it didn't show up here...
